# exemplify

A tool to bootstrap your development environment on new machines.


# Installation

Install via `pip`:

    $ pip install exemplify

Or `pipx`:

    $ pipx install exemplify


# Usage

To sync your environment:

    $ exemplify [ROUTINE]
